document_data.mainbody:
lethvagis Coins was a moneychanging house located in Waterdeep during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The building stood two stories tall.
Hlethvagis Coins was located in the far southern section of Waterdeeps Southern Ward near the South Gate where the Way of the Dragon and Waymoot joined. The rear of the building sat on Carters Way.
The business was owned by Hlethvagi Anteos in the .
